channel.title: Need help with buttons
channel.description: in interface 12624 there are left/right, and a close button, but the number moparscape gives me in the top left when i mouse over them is not the right one,and i cannot figure it out, like in case 185, if i want to make the accept button work for the char select window i add [code] case 14067: RemoveAllWindows(); break; [/code] so i can not figure out what numbers to use to make the close button or the left/right buttons work. so can anyone tell me how to find the ids or give them to me?

item.title: Need help with buttons
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

and i tried them all and none work!

ok so i just got done with my own test, i made parseincmingpackets2() then i copied the clicking most buttons switch, then i tested cases 1-20000 and none of them closed the window. im going to do another 10000 but i dont think its going to work, can some one just give me the numbers?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with buttons
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

Left arrow ID’s = 840, 1787, 12712, 13347, 13508, 15566, 16062,
Right arrow ID’s = 573, 842, 188, 12714, 13349, 13507, 15567, 16064,
Close ID’s = 10597, 10969, 12762, 16669, 17288,

Read full topic

case 14067:
RemoveAllWindows();
break;
